title: Profile
name: Name

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.show_phone: Show phone number to other users

tip_unique: Use a unique password that you don't use for other accounts
tip_manager: Consider using a password manager to generate and store strong passwords
password_description: Update your password to keep your account secure. Make sure to use a strong password that includes uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_needs_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_needs_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_needs_number: Password must contain at least one number
password_needs_special: Password must contain at least one special character
same_password: New password cannot be the same as current password
password_not_strong: Password does not meet strength requirements
verification_code_error: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
update_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
verification_code_help: We've sent a verification code to your email. Please enter it above.
change_email_description: Change your email address. You'll need to verify the new email before the change takes effect.
verification_code_sent_to: A verification code has been sent to {{email}}
enter_6_digit_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your email
same_email_error: New email cannot be the same as current email
email_change_security_notice: Changing your email will require verification. You will receive a 6-digit code at your new email address to confirm the change.
